hints.content: The $\goldD{A}$ is at $\redD8{:}{\blueE{05}}$ because it is located $\blueE{5}$ ticks after $\redD8{:}{00}$.

On a clock, $\redD8{:}{00} $ looks like this:

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 8. The long minute hand points to 12.Labels outside the edge of the clock are number 1 through 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8f575ec597c4f081f4b2247a97787fda55de3a9d)

And just like on the number line, $8{:}{\blueE{05}}$ is $\blueE{5}$ ticks after $8{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 8. The long minute hand points to 1. Outside the edge of the clock 12 is labeled 0, 1 is labeled 5, 2 is labeled 10, and so on with 11 labeled 55.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/abe2844ed64638125e3b660e1c7fe6b272190a19)

This clock shows $8{:}{05}$.

![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 8. The long minute hand points to 1.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1fdeb15fdad76346c698ba25a4fcb530372a6844)

question.content:
**Which clock matches the time shown on the number line?**

![The number line goes from 8:00 to 9:00. Every 15 minutes there are labels at 8:15, 8:30, and 8:45. Point A is labeled at 5 marks to the right of 8:00.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/06f84a9ca6211fd4182d08e7769980b2ffaea2b1)

[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A clock shows the short hour hand is between 5 and 6. The long minute hand points to 8.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/54bc008209a2b66b8e1a414a4985c8f254586d5c)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is between 8 and 9. The long minute hand points to 5.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/13722e9a128317f9dac20171806a4dc0f7a733ab)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is just past 8. The long minute hand points to 1.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1fdeb15fdad76346c698ba25a4fcb530372a6844)
